title: Calories in Skinny Pop Popcorn
meta_description: Discover calories in skinny pop popcorn per serving, including carbs, protein, fat, fiber, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Original flavor, popped with sunflower oil, standard serving size of 28g (about 3.5 cups popped).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, and exact serving size. Check product packaging for most accurate info.

quick_answer.text: One 28g serving of Skinny Pop popcorn provides 150 kcal and 3g fiber.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp melted butter per serving
White Cheddar flavor instead of Original

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of skinny pop popcorn?
What are the macros for skinny pop popcorn?
faqs.a: Per serving: 19g carbs, 3g fiber, 2g protein, 7g fat.

faqs.q: Is skinny pop popcorn low in sodium?
How much fiber in skinny pop popcorn?
Does skinny pop popcorn have sugars?
faqs.a: No added sugars; 0g total sugars per serving.
